Text:
You will have to forgive my ignorance, but westerners are supposed to "understand" why radicalized muslims want to destroy western civilization? And when this is accomplished, radicalized muslims will not want to destroy western civilization? 

OK then. I understand why they want to destroy western civilization, because the koran commands muslims to kill infidels!! 

Now how is "understanding" this fact going to stop radical islamists?
